attributes.action: Legislate manufactures to produce greener products and not tax consumers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Consumers consume that's fact. But they will only consume what is available, i.e. If manufactures make cars that no longer run on fossil fuel, this would in a number of years replace most current petrol/diesel cars. Do this instead of raising taxes (current tax rises on cars, will only get peoples backs up.)

rejection.details: Please review the wording of your title.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
